|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 256 KiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5TU32M16AG-3C; |ram1_num = 2 <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1118; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = yes <!-- 4K, 7K and 9K Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->

|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = none

|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = 1.8 x 6.9 x 6.2" (4.5 x 17.5 x 15.6cm) |weight = 2.5 lb (1.1kg)
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The 1TB LinkStation Live LS-CHL Network Hard Drive from Buffalo is an Ethernet hard disk, compatible with Windows and Mac clients. It features a Gigabit Ethernet interface and an integrated USB print server. It can also be used as an iTunes server, DLNA media server, and FTP server. You'll even be able to access data stored on the drive when you're away from home, via a web interface.
===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/nas/nas-reviews/new-to-the-charts-buffalo-linkstation-live-ls-chl/ ''Buffalo LinkStation Live (LS-CHL)'' Review on '''SNB''']
